channel.title: Placement on Centre for Environmental Data Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Placement on Centre for Environmental Data Analysis

item.title: Data, docker and Django - Rory and Zach's Journey at CEDA
item.description: This year, CEDA had the pleasure of welcoming two industrial placement students, Rory Jenns and Zach Wharton, who joined us as Software Engineers for their Industrial Placement year.

item.title: From Rubik's Cubes to Data Cubes Adrian Dębski’s Industrial Placement year with CEDA
item.description: Adrian Dębski, holder of 3 European and 13 Polish ‘speed-cubing’ records, joined the Centre for Environmental Data Analysis (CEDA) for his Year in Industry as part of his BSc Computer Science degree at Aberystwyth University in August 2022.

item.title: High-flying Year in Industry Student Kate Winfield’s time with CEDA
item.description: Last July the Centre for Environmental Data Analysis (CEDA) welcomed Kate Winfield, who joined us for her Year In Industry as part of her BSc Geography degree at Coventry University.
